item.title: k8s: Cluster API v1.12: Introducing In-place Updates and Chained Upgrades
item.description:
Cluster API v1.12.0 adds two major features — in‑place updates and chained upgrades — enabling mutable updates of existing Machines when safe and orchestrated multi‑minor‑version upgrades respectively, while keeping immutable rollouts and strong extensibility as core design principles.

  • Source: Kubernetes Official Blog

item.title: azure: [In preview] Public Preview: New integration and extensibility capabilities to Azure SRE Agent
item.description:
Microsoft announced a public preview of new integration and extensibility capabilities for Azure SRE Agent — an AI-driven, prompt-based automation layer that unifies operational workflows and aims to reduce complexity and overhead for cloud operations.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: vscode: Expanding Model Choice in VS Code with Bring Your Own Key
item.description:
The VS Code blog post introduces the new Language Model Chat Provider API and a Bring Your Own Key (BYOK) experience that lets extensions and users choose and integrate different language models for chat functionality, increasing model choice and extensibility in the editor.

  • Source: Visual Studio Code
